name: Terror from the Deep! (Skill Card)
text:
Mako / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase, while you control "Kairyu-Shin".
When this Skill is activated, you can activate "Umi" directly from your hand, Deck or GY.
While you control "Kairyu-Shin", all WATER monsters you control are unaffected by Trap effects.
If "Kairyu-Shin" you control leaves the field, draw 2 cards, and if you do, flip this card over.
